name: Drone Delivery (GruseT)
description:
Drone Delivery

You are tasked with delivering packages as quickly and accuratley as possible while flying a drone. 

To pick up a package hover above it and it should connect.

The Drone can take 3 hits. And packages can break if dropped on non-target zones.

Controls - Keyboard

W - Move Foward

S - Move Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Arrow Key Up - Move Up

Arrow Key Down - Move Down

Spacebar - Drop Package

Controls - Gamepad

Topleft joystick - move horizontally

Right joystick - move vertical

Gamepad (A) - Drop Package
